Posts.Content: Hey...just got seeds implanted 2 weeks ago for mild/moderate case of prostate cancer. Starting external beam next week. I have the usual side effects, and am starting flomax, but the biggest problem is lower back pain when I start to urinate, it feels like I am seizing up very intensely, and though it abates after urinating, it is now generally always sore. Does anyone know what this is...or any suggestions for symptomatic relief...? Some concern that it is kidney related? Thanks...
Posts.Title: hard back pain with seeds and radiation treatment
